sentences.en: A decade later, the company has gone from strength to strength.
sentences.cn: 十年后，该公司已经逐渐壮大。

sentences.en: A few years later, Katya succumbed to cancer in London.
sentences.cn: 几年后，卡佳因患癌症在伦敦病逝。

sentences.en: A moment later, Cohen picked up the phone. "Hello?"
sentences.cn: 过了一会儿，科恩接起电话。“喂？”

sentences.en: At a later news conference, he said differences should not be dramatized.
sentences.cn: 在后来的新闻发布会上，他说不应夸大分歧。

sentences.en: He has admitted the charge and will be sentenced later.
sentences.cn: 他已经认罪，会在晚些时候宣判。

sentences.en: He knew full well he'd be ashamed of himself later.
sentences.cn: 他很清楚地知道自己过后会无地自容。

sentences.en: I imagine they'll be tearing the building down sooner or later.
sentences.cn: 我猜他们早晚会拆除这座楼的。

sentences.en: I’m going out for a bit – I’ll see you later.
Later he was to become famous as a pacifist.
sentences.cn: 后来他就变成了一位知名的和平主义者。

sentences.en: Less than a half hour later he returned upstairs.
sentences.cn: 不到半个小时，他又跑上楼来。

sentences.en: Soldiers took away four people one of whom was later released.
sentences.cn: 士兵们抓走4个人，其中1个随后被放了回来。

sentences.en: Steps taken now to maximise your health will pay dividends later on.
sentences.cn: 现在采取措施增强体质会使你日后受益。

sentences.en: The launch was postponed to a later date.
The opera lacks the polish of his later work.
sentences.cn: 这部歌剧不及他晚期作品娴熟。

sentences.en: The role of marketing is dealt with in a later chapter.
sentences.cn: 市场营销的作用会在后面的章节中述及。

sentences.en: Thirty seconds later she reappeared and beckoned them forward.
sentences.cn: 30秒后她又出现了，示意他们往前来。

sentences.en: Two days later, they implanted the fertilized eggs back inside me.
sentences.cn: 两天以后，他们把受精卵重新植入了我的体内。

sentences.en: Two years later he is flat broke and on the dole.
sentences.cn: 两年后，他一贫如洗，靠失业救济金生活。

phrases.tran_cn: adv. 后来；稍后；过些时候

trans.tran_cn: 后来的，以后的，接近末期的，晚年的
trans.tran_en: coming in the future or after something else

trans.tran_cn: 较晚地，以后，过后，后来，随后
trans.tran_en: after the time you are talking about or after the present time
